tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fashion_designers (
    designer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    designer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    design_ideas TEXT,
    resources_available JSON
)

CREATE TABLE design_ideas (
  idea_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  idea_description TEXT,
  idea_image_url VARCHAR(100),
  designer_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (designer_id) REFERENCES designer (designer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE resources (
  resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  resource_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  resource_type VARCHAR(50),
  resource_link VARCHAR(100),
  designer_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (designer_id) REFERENCES designer (designer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE collaborations (
  collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  collaboration_description TEXT,
  collaborators VARCHAR(100),
  designer_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (designer_id) REFERENCES designer (designer_id)
);
